articles.headline: Rookie WR Jalen Royals reminds Chiefs of Rashee Rice
articles.description: The rookie receiver has explosive traits the Chiefs love, especially his ability to run after the catch.

articles.headline: Missouri special session to be held for Chiefs, Royals plans
articles.description: Missouri's governor said Friday that he will call the Legislature into a special session to consider incentives aimed at keeping the Kansas City Chiefs and Royals from moving to Kansas.

images.name: Chiefs play round of 'Cash Cab' for 2025 schedule release

articles.headline: Rookie NFL running back role tiers: Stacking 25 draft picks
articles.description: Which rookie RBs will make noise in 2025? We grouped 25 draft picks by expected Year 1 role, from Ashton Jeanty to Jacory Croskey-Merritt.

articles.headline: 2025 NFL schedule release: Chargers, Falcons among top reveals
articles.description: The 2025 NFL schedule was released Wednesday, prompting unique reveals by multiple teams on social media.
